ads.author: John DeMartini
ads.title: Williams Pinbot Pinball Machine
ads.description:
Up for sale is a Williams Pinbot Pinball Machine.  Manufactured in 1986/1987, this is a space-themed pinball with simple rules. Key shots include the ramp, drop targets, and a vortex ramp. Also has multi-ball.

Overall, this machine is in great shape with only normal signs of use. 
Playfield looks beautiful and backglass  is in wonderful shape. Machine has been recently serviced with new bumper rubbers, lights replaced with cooler and lower wattage #47 bulbs. It is fully cleaned, working 100% and ready to go.  

Also, the battery board has been replaced with a remote battery pack, so no more worrying about leaky batteries destroying the CPU.  In addition, the notorious unprotected bridge rectifier issue has been fixed with new fuse systems installed for added protection. Will come with original service manual.  

If interested please contact me. Pickup in the Brandon / Valrico area or buyer arranges freight.

Please don't just ask if it is available and not follow up. If ad is up then it is available. I will likely ignore just \

ads.author: Donald Hopkins
ads.title: 18 pinball games for sale near Atlanta
ads.description:
I've decided to sell some of my pinball games. I currently have 18 games that I'd like to sell. They are all working and in generally great condition. Most games are fully LED and many have mods etc etc. They are all plug and Play, ready to go. YOU ARE WELCOME TO COME PLAY THEM AT MY HOME. MSG ME TO SET UP A DAY & TIME. 

My firm prices are generally in the pinside average window. Not the top price but not the bottom price either. Somewhere in the middle. I'm looking to get a fair price. 

>>>>>>I will NOT entertain any offers. The listed price is the price for the game.<<<<<

Terminator 3. Chrome edition signed by Steve Ritchie. It's one of 50 made by Jersey. Jack back when he was selling pinball games. It's very rare. $5,000 

Who dunnit is in great shape. The reels work as they should and the game has been 100% reliable. It's in beautiful condition. $4,000

Punchy the clown is one of 103 made. It works excellent and has been fully led. $3,500 

Hard body 1987 is in good condition and was restored a couple years ago. It's fully led and works well. A fairly rare game that's hard to find in this condition. $2,500 

NBA Fast break. Works excellent. Looks good. Plays well and always reliable. $3,900 

Bally spectrum. A super rare game that was restored by a gentleman in Alabama. He used all yopicles instead of conventional incandescent bulbs. The restoration is amazing. $4,900 

2014 Stern mustang pro. This is one of 50 made on the anniversary of the mustang. It has a plaque on the speaker board below the back glass designating it as a special edition. It's quite rare. You don't see these come up for sale often. $6,500 

Stern Munsters pro. Great condition. Has a few mods plays 100%. No issues or excuses. $6,000.

Stern AC/DC Lucy edition. This the much better original edition not the later one. It has a few mods and plays really well. Color, DMD, pin, sound speakers and so much more. $10,000 

Jurassic Park pro. Great condition plays perfectly. $6,000.

Stern Harley-Davidson second edition plays great and looks good! $4,100 

Firepower. Restored by arcade artifacts out of Pennsylvania about 2 years ago. The restoration is incredible and you can find a video on YouTube showing the details of the restoration. It's the nicest firepower you will see. $5,000.

Stern CSI. Fully LED plays beautifully and looks good. No excuses. $4,500.

World poker tour. Great game! Super fun! Some mods including an alternate back glass translite. I will also include the original translite. $3,500 

Stern NBA. Super rare game plays and looks fine. $4,700.

Big indian electromechanical game. Works perfectly. No issues. $1,300.

Monster bash original 1998 looks good. Plays great. $8,000.

Pinball adventures punny factory. This is the limited edition engraved cabinet. It's very unique. Super Super rare game. Game works 100%. I guarantee you'll be the only one of your friends with this game! $7,000.

ads.description: Bally truck stop pinball machine needs work on flippers and needs new side art everything else works perfect has manual and has glass just not on it right now all lights and sounds are great pickup only in tallassee al CASH Only if listed its available will not respond to certain messages Sold As Is Thanks For Looking

ads.author: Max Johnson
ads.title: WANTED: FIRE! pinball machine
ads.description: I am re-starting a program where I place a FIRE! pinball machine in a fire station on $.50 per play.  At the end of the month, I count the quarters, match the amount, and then donate it to the charity of the stations choice.  The game gives the guys something to do when they arent working, and the proceeds help others.  I did this many years ago and it was a very successful event.  I rotate the game into another fire station every 60 days.  I need two or three more machines (FIRE!) due to the sheer number of fire stations there are.  I cant pay top dollar because this is for non profit.  I restore each of these games before they are placed so that they look good and are less likely to fail.  I of course pay for all the repairs.  There is NO cost to the firefighters, other than paying fifty cents (or donating $.50) to a charity.   If you know of anyone who has a FIRE! pinball and would like it to go to a very good cause, let me know.

ads.author: Shawn Crowley
ads.title: Vintage 1977 Star Explorer Home Pinball Machine – Model PH 7730 – $500 (Collector Item)
ads.description:
For sale is an original Star Explorer vintage home pinball machine from the late 1970s.
One-owner, well cared for, and still in good working condition.

This is the Phillips/Sentinel home edition, Model PH 7730, which is harder to find complete and intact. Comes with the original owner’s manual, which adds to its collector value! 

Condition
 • Powers on and plays
 • Original artwork still vibrant
 • Some light rust on metal trim from age
 • A few bulbs are out — I attempted to replace them but couldn’t find the correct vintage bulbs
 • Backglass and plastics are uncracked
 • All original hardware

Why it’s collectible
 • Produced in the late 1970s for home use
 • Smaller and lighter than commercial pinball machines
 • Low production compared to arcade units
 • Great for collectors, restorers, or someone wanting a retro display/game piece

Asking $500. Pickup only. Cash Only

ads.author: Brandon Grieve
ads.title: Stern Stranger Things Pinball
ads.description:
FOR SALE: Stern Stranger Things Pro — HUO • Only 559 Plays • Loaded With Extras!

Official Stern Topper, Shooter Rod, Armor, Inner Art Blades, UV Kits Included

Like-New • First Owner • Latest Code Installed

Offering my Stranger Things Pro in like-new condition. I’m the original owner, and this game has lived its entire life in a climate-controlled, non-smoking home. It plays perfectly, looks fantastic, and includes some of the hardest-to-find accessories already installed.

Only 559 total plays, updated to the latest Stern code, and presents exactly as a HUO collector-quality machine should.

Condition

Home Use Only — First Owner

Only 559 total plays

Like new inside and out

Latest code installed

No mechanical issues

Cabinet, playfield, ramps, targets, screens, and mechs all look and function perfectly

This is a clean, collector-level example.

Included + Installed Upgrades

These official Stern accessories are already pre-installed and ready to enjoy:

Official Stern Stranger Things Topper

Official Stern Shooter Rod

Official Stern Cabinet Armor Set

These add tremendous value and visual impact.

Included but Not Yet Installed (Brand new in box)

Stranger Things Inner Art Blades

UV Light Kit(s)

These are some of the most desirable Stranger Things accessories — especially the UV kit for the hidden/invisible ink playfield effects.

Pickup / Shipping

Easy ground-level pickup

Willing to coordinate shipping via STI/Beltmann, Fast Eddie, or your preferred transporter

Price

Asking $7,000
Open to reasonable offers. Willing to consider trades for Avatar CE, Monster Bash LE, Elvira's HOH (40th Anniversary or Blood Red Kiss Edition), Willy Wonka CE, and Wizard of Oz Yellow Brick Road Edition only. But they must be in new or like-new condition. I'm not interested in other trades. Please don't ask. And yes, I realize that I'd have to add cash to the trade.
